text: Which of these statements best describes the relationship between scripts and components?

options.text: Every component has a script, and you can create and customize components using scripts.
You can create a new component for a GameObject by creating a script, but you canâ€™t customize a built-in component.
Scripts and components work together to control the properties and behaviors of a GameObject.
Some components are customizable with scripts.

feedbackCorrect: All components have scripts. Some inputs to the script of the component are displayed as the properties and behaviors that you see in the Inspector window.
feedbackIncorrect: All components have scripts. Some inputs to the script of the component are displayed as the properties and behaviors that you see in the Inspector window.
